sentence: pick up the purple block in the rear center and attach it to the right side of the previous purple block
pick up the purple block in the rear center and attach it to the right side of the purple block in the rear corner
pick up the other purple one in the back and place it to the right side of the purple block you just moved
pick up the purple block behind the red block and place it to the right side of the purple block in the rear corner
pick up the rear one among the purple blocks that you have not moved yet and place it to the right side of the block you just moved
